import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; class Users extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { users: [], // To store the list of users error: null, // To store error messages }; } componentDidMount() { // Make the GET API call when the component is mounted fetch('http://localhost/react/epicpro-backend/get_users.php') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { if (data.status === 'success') { this.setState({ users: data.data }); // Update users in state } else { this.setState({ error: data.message }); // Update error in state } }) .catch(err => { this.setState({ error: 'Failed to fetch data' }); console.error(err); }); } render() { const { fixNavbar } = this.props; const { users, error } = this.state; return ( <>
